title: Ep 354 - Fungus the Bogeyman and Dragons Love Tacos (Children's Book Week 2019)
itunes:title: Ep 354 - Fungus the Bogeyman and Dragons Love Tacos (Children's Book Week 2019)
description:
This year's Children's Book Week - on the eve of the podcast's first child, no less - is about Raymond Briggs' weirdly existential and British Fungus the Bogeyman, and the much lighter and sillier Dragons Love Tacos by Adam Rubin and Daniel Salmieri.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
This year's Children's Book Week - on the eve of the podcast's first child, no less - is about Raymond Briggs' weirdly existential and British Fungus the Bogeyman, and the much lighter and sillier Dragons Love Tacos by Adam Rubin and Daniel Salmieri.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:keywords: podcasts, BOOKS, andrew cunningham, literature, craig getting, comedy
